attributes.action: make chiropractic treatments available on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have to pay for chiropractic treatments. I have not been offered any alternatives on the NHS and am spending some of my DLA when I think it should be free.
Surely with so many working days lost due to 'bad backs' it would be in the government's interests to do this?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
